attributes.action: Decline all calls for a general election
attributes.additional_details: To call a general election within a year is an abuse of the democratic process and a waste of public money.  When the people voted in July 2024 they did so for a Labour Government to serve for a full term.
attributes.background: To reject all calls for a general election and to carry out the mandate issued by the electorate on 4 July 2024.  Furthermore, to carryout this mandate  for as long as practically possible up to a full 5 year term.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do Not Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703000
